title: r/AskThe_Donald is literally just r/The_Donald and not remotely close to anything resembling a Q&A sub. Nearly every post links to a fake news article or some random conspiracy blog. 75k subscribers.

author: [deleted]
text: Stop it, you know they arenâ€™t doing it as a courtesy extended to a former president.

author: akaean
text: Indeed.  Context is important.  When the context is that they believe wild conspiracy theories about how the election was stolen and that Trump is the rightful president currently... they definitely don't mean it in the way that we would refer to President Carter, or President Clinton, or President Bush, or President Obama as a courtesy of their past office.

author: Tobacconist
text: You're right. Just makes us look worse. Unfortunately we have to hold ourselves to higher standards than the idiots.

author: Valo-FfM
text: But once again: They wildly lie about Trump being the legitimate President so any title they give him connected to that is illegitimate

author: KingoftheJabari
text: Funny how they didn't do that for Obama.
